pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, March 23, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, March 23, 2017:

Toronto, Ontario

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a technology demonstration with students of the Angelo DelZotto School of Construction Management at George Brown College.

E Building, Casa Loma Campus
George Brown College
146 Kendal Avenue
Toronto, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

D322 BIM Visionarium
Casa Loma Campus
George Brown College
160 Kendal Avenue
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media must arrive no later than 11:00 a.m. and present themselves in the Lobby, 146 Kendal Avenue.
